title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, Pecorino cheese, pancetta, and black pepper. Simple, rich, and delicious.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, crisp the pancetta in a pan.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, cheese, and a generous amount of black pepper.
Drain the pasta, reserving some water. Toss the hot pasta with the egg mixture and pancetta off the heat. Use pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately, topped with more cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth, buttery, and creamy tomato-based gravy. A universally loved Indian dish.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt, half the ginger-garlic paste, and spices for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or bake the chicken pieces until cooked through.
Sauté remaining ginger-garlic paste, then add crushed tomatoes and simmer.
Stir in the grilled chicken and cream. Cook for 5-10 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetarian Chili
summary: A hearty and flavorful meatless chili packed with beans, corn, and a blend of spices. Perfect for a cold evening.
instructions: Sauté onion and bell pepper until soft.
Stir in chili powder and cook for 1 minute.
Add crushed tomatoes, kidney beans, black beans, and corn.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for at least 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve with your favorite toppings.
